snippet: The 43 veterans wrote that they refused to continue to be “tools” of Israel’s military rule in the occupied territories, and that information collected “harms innocent people” and “is used for political persecution.”
abstract: Israeli military threatens disciplinary action against group of veterans and active reservists of a secretive military intelligence unit who say they will no longer participate in surveillance activities against Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: The 43 veterans wrote that they refused to continue to be “tools” of Israel’s military rule in the occupied territories, and that information collected “harms innocent people” and “is used for political persecution.”

headline.main: Reprisals for Israeli Soldiers Refusing to Spy
headline.print_headline: Reprisals for Israeli Soldiers Refusing to Spy
